title: 436 15 "The Showdown Has Come! Luffy's Desperate Last Attack!"Transliteration: "Shiyū Kessu! Sutemi no Rufi Saigo no Ichigeki" (Japanese:雌雄決す! 捨て身のルフィ最後の一撃) Hiroaki Miyamoto Hitoshi Tanaka January 31, 2010(2010-01-31)[21]
transformers_text:
436 15 "The Showdown Has Come! Luffy's Desperate Last Attack!"Transliteration: "Shiyū Kessu! Sutemi no Rufi Saigo no Ichigeki" (Japanese:雌雄決す! 捨て身のルフィ最後の一撃) Hiroaki Miyamoto Hitoshi Tanaka January 31, 2010(2010-01-31)[21]

Hannyabal quickly defeats Buggy and Mr. 3. Luffy becomes weaker as a result of absorbing Magellan's poison, and is no longer able to fight effectively. Unwilling to give up, he continues to press on the attack, repeatedly taking in Magellan's poison and finally being defeated and lying on the ground, fatally poisoned.
